log

public static void log(java.lang.Exception exception)
Creates an BSDLogger object, logging the exception, while automatically deriving the className and methodName.
Parameters:
exception - the exception to be logged.

log

public static void log(long priority,
                       java.lang.Object className,
                       java.lang.String methodName,
                       java.lang.Exception exception)
Creates an BSDLogger object while logging the priority, className, methodName and exception.
Parameters:
priority - the priority level of the message (NONE, INFO, WARNING, ERROR, FATAL).
className - the class name of the calling procedure for tracking purposes.
methodName - the method name of the calling procedure for tracking purposes.
exception - the exception to log.
